home.title: Welcome to Face Recognition App
home.description: This application allows you to register and recognize faces using AI.

register.title: Register New Face
register.description: Complete the form below to register a new face in the system. Please upload a clear image with a single face.

form.name: Your Name:
form.photoDesc: Please select a clear photo of your face. Only one face should be visible in the image.

error.name: Please enter your name
error.general: Failed to register face. Please try a different image.

newspaper.intro: The Face Registration process allows users to securely register their face biometrics for fast and contactless identification. This technology uses advanced neural networks to create a unique facial signature.
newspaper.benefits: Benefits of face registration include enhanced security, faster identification, and a convenient authentication method without the need for passwords or ID cards.
newspaper.privacy: Your privacy is our priority. All facial data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with global data protection regulations.

recognize.title: Recognize Face
recognize.description: Upload a photo or take a snapshot to identify a registered person.

error.noImage: Please select an image or take a snapshot

newspaper.intro: Our state-of-the-art facial recognition system can identify registered users in seconds with remarkable accuracy. The system works by comparing facial features to those stored in our secure database.
newspaper.technology: The technology uses over 100 facial landmarks to create a unique digital signature of each face, making it highly accurate even under varying lighting conditions or when facial accessories are worn.
newspaper.accuracy: In recent tests, our system demonstrated a 99.7% accuracy rate, with near-instant recognition times averaging less than 200 milliseconds per identification.

users.title: Registered Users
users.description: View all users registered in the facial recognition system.
users.search: Search by name, ID, department or role...
users.noMatches: No users match your search criteria.

common.mockDataWarning: Note: Displaying sample data. Connect to API for real data.

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in to your account to access the face recognition system.

error.failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

status.title: API Status
status.firstEndpointFailed: First health endpoint failed, trying alternative...
status.secondEndpointFailed: Second health endpoint failed, trying final alternative...
status.allEndpointsFailed: All API health check attempts failed:
